name: codeforfun-xo-game
description: X and O game made in collaboration

scripts.genKeys: openssl genrsa -out keys/key.pem 2048 && openssl req -new -key keys/key.pem -out keys/csr.pem -subj '/CN=localhost' && openssl x509 -req -days 365 -in keys/csr.pem -signkey keys/key.pem -out keys/cert.pem

author: zero10xy
